title: Bad Company - Burnin' Sky [320k MP3]
description:
Burnin' Sky is the fourth album by the band Bad Company. It was released in 1977 

Burnin' Sky was recorded in France at ChÃƒÂ¢teau d'HÃƒÂ©rouville in July and August 1976 with future Rolling Stones engineer Chris Kimsey but its release was delayed until March 1977 as to not compete with the band's then-current album Run with the Pack.

The album peaked at a disappointing (compared to their previous albums) No. 15 on the Billboard's Pop Albums chart but was the band's fourth consecutive US Gold certified album.

The album's only charting single was the title cut which peaked at No. 78 on the singles chart.
